title: You can get All-Clad cookware at unbelievable prices right now
text:
You can get All-Clad cookware at unbelievable prices right now

The Factory Seconds sale offers huge discounts on cookware, bakeware, and more. (Photo: All-Clad)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

The fall is the time to invest in new cookware. You're probably roasting more veggies, whipping up comforting bowls of soup, and preparing for Thanksgiving. To make the cooking experience more streamlined, you're going to want to use the best cookware around—a.k.a. All-Clad. Typically, this expensive cookware brand is out of budget for many of us, but right now you can get insanely low prices on All-Clad thanks to a Factory Seconds Sale.

This Cookware Week Sale is offering up to 80% off All-Clad pots, pans, baking sheets, and various other elite cooking tools you may need. You can also save on T-fal, a great budget cookware brand, and WMF, another great high-end cookware brand, as well. Plus, you can save an extra 10%, which is applied at checkout, and get free shipping on every purchase.

With insane savings like this, it's a great time to stock up on Thanksgiving essentials from All-Clad like a roasting rack for $69.95, a probe thermometer for $27.95, and a lasagna pan for $49.95. There's also incredible prices on cookware sets, meaning you can fill your entire kitchen with All-Clad products.

The catch? Since these products are factory seconds, they will probably have a few scratches or small dings—but there’s no need for concern. All this means is that these products couldn't be sold at full price because of these minor imperfections, which will happen anyway after cooking with them over time and does not diminish the actual quality of the cookware.

This sale goes until Sunday, October 20, so you have limited time to snag this incredible cookware at amazing prices. To access this sale pricing, simply enter in your email to start shopping!

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
